name: Brands_DeleteBrands
description:
This method deletes one or more brand profiles from an account, based on the brand IDs that you include in the `brandsRequest`.

Either or both of the following settings must be enabled for the account to use this method:

- `canSelfBrandSign`
- `canSelfBrandSend`

### Related topics

- [How to create a brand](/docs/esign-rest-api/how-to/create-brand/)

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

brandsRequest.description: Details about one or more brands.
brandsRequest.x-ms-summary: Details about one or more brands.

brandRequest.description: This request object contains information about a specific brand.

brandId.description: The ID of the brand used in API calls

brandRequest.x-ms-summary: This request object contains information about a specific brand.

$block: The AccountBrands resource enables you to use account-level brands to customize the styles and text that recipients see.

$ul: **recipientBrandIdDefault**: The brand that envelope recipients see when a brand is not explicitly set.
**senderBrandIdDefault**: The brand that envelope senders see when a brand is not explicitly set.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
